arts.ttl: Chris Davies 'was worried' when Lukas Jutkiewicz goal sparked Birmingham City chaos
arts.sum: Jutkiewicz, who has served Birmingham City for nine seasons, opened his League One account with the sixth and final goal in a 6-2 win over Barnsley. Birmingham City battered Barnsley 6-2 at St Andrew's @ Knighthead Park with Lukas Jutkiewicz scoring the sixth goal

arts.ttl: Alfie May brace boosts Birmingham to victory in eight-goal Barnsley rout
Promotion permutations: Birmingham City’s route to the Championship before Wembley final
arts.sum: Meanwhile, second-placed Wrexham – who are 11 points behind Blues having played two games more – host Burton Albion this weekend, and third-placed Wycombe travel to Reading. If Wrexham fail to beat Burton this weekend or Wycombe fail to beat Reading, Blues will be promoted if they beat Barnsley and Peterborough to reach 95 points.

arts.ttl: Barry Fry predicts ‘surprise’ for Birmingham City at Wembley after ruining ‘American Dream’
arts.sum: Barry Fry says the Wembley meeting between Birmingham City and Peterborough United is ‘a dream come true’ after his current side ruined the prospect of another Hollywood Derby. Peterborough United Director of Football Barry Fry managed Birmingham City for two-and-a-half years before leaving in 1996
